title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The Open/Close project option is sometimes available for P1 and P2 selections
EB: The Open/Close project option should either be available for both P1 and P2 selections or be disabled for both selections.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator section. 
2. Select P1 and P2. 
3. Observe whether the Open/Close project option is available for both selections.
